app-store-banner.connect: Connect from anywhere using our mobile app.
app-store-banner.unknown-os: Now available for iOS and Android.

account-recovery.account-recovery-code:
If you can’t access your mobile device to receive the two-factor
            verification code, you can use a verification code that will be sent
            to your email and the recovery code provided when you enabled
            two-factor authentication.
account-recovery.description: We sent a login code to your email. Enter both the login code and the recovery code below
account-recovery.lost-recovery-code: If you can’t access your mobile device or recovery code you can request a reset of your authentication settings. For security reasons this can take 1-3 business days.
account-recovery.lost-recovery-code-heading: Lost your mobile device and recovery codes?
account-recovery.title: Two-Factor Account Recovery

auth-mfa.mfa-verification-sent: A verification code has been sent to your mobile device. {{number}} This code is only valid for 3 minutes.
auth-mfa.title: SMS Two-Factor Authentication
auth-mfa.totp-mfa-verification: Enter the one-time password generated by your authentication app.

password-error.missing-lower: The password must contain an lowercase letter.
password-error.missing-number: The password must contain a number.
password-error.missing-special-char: The password must contain at least one of the the following characters
password-error.missing-upper: The password must contain an uppercase letter.
password-error.too-long: The password must be no more than {{max_length}} characters long.
password-error.too-short: The password must be at least {{min_length}} characters long.

forgot-password-verify.password-rules: Passwords must be {{min_length}}-{{max_length}} characters, contain a number, an uppercase and lowercase letter, and at least one of the the following characters
forgot-password-verify.success-message: Your password has been reset, please sign in
forgot-password-verify.title: Verify Your Account
forgot-password-verify.verification-link-message: An email verification link has been sent to you. Click the link and return here. Then press continue to sign in.

password-reset.cognito-reset-password-required: For security purposes, we require users to change their passwords periodically. A verification code has been sent to {{email}}, please check your email then enter the verification code and update your password.
password-reset.signout-all-text: Current sessions will remain active. If you have experienced a security breach, signing out everywhere is recommended.  To sign out everywhere, sign in to app.remote.it and then go to the accounts page to sign out everywhere.
password-reset.verification-code-message: A verification code has been sent to {{email}}, please check your email then enter the verification code and update your password.
